data.title: Verizon: Wireless, Internet, TV and Phone Services
data.meta_description: Shop Verizon smartphone deals and wireless plans on the largest 4G LTE network. First to 5G. Get Fios for the fastest internet, TV and phone service.
data.text:
NFL Sunday

Ticket from YouTube, on us

Plus a new phone, all on us. A value of $1,250.

For this season with select phone trade-in, in any condition. New and existing customers with Unlimited Ultimate.
